mapper.update: INSERT INTO WTM_TAA_CODE (TENANT_ID, ENTER_CD, TAA_CD, TAA_NM, TAA_TYPE_CD, HOL_INCL_YN, REQUEST_TYPE_CD, WORK_YN, WORK_APPR_HOUR, NOTE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID) VALUES (TRIM( #{enterCd} ), TRIM( #{taaCd} ), TRIM( #{taaNm} ), TRIM( #{taaTypeCd} ), TRIM( #{holInclYn} ), TRIM( #{requestTypeCd} ), TRIM( #{workYn} ), TRIM( #{workApprHour} ), TRIM( #{note} ), NOW(), TRIM( #{sabun} )) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TAA_NM = VALUES(TAA_NM), TAA_TYPE_CD = VALUES(TAA_TYPE_CD), HOL_INCL_YN = VALUES(HOL_INCL_YN), REQUEST_TYPE_CD = VALUES(REQUEST_TYPE_CD), WORK_YN = VALUES(WORK_YN), WORK_APPR_HOUR = VALUES(WORK_APPR_HOUR), NOTE = VALUES(NOTE), UPDATE_DATE = NOW(), UPDATE_ID = VALUES(UPDATE_ID)
